name: Conjuror's Eye

minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 610 MB available space
